--- title: Workouts description: Workouts and routines image: /static/resources/workouts.png --- ## Routines ::: {.cell execution_count=1} ``` {.python .cell-code} import pandas as pd workouts = "../static/resources/workouts.xlsx" w1 = pd.read_excel(workouts, sheet_name=0) w2 = pd.read_excel(workouts, sheet_name=1) w3 = pd.read_excel(workouts, sheet_name=2) w4 = pd.read_excel(workouts, sheet_name=3) schedule = pd.read_excel(workouts, sheet_name=4) ``` ::: The following regimen outlines a 4 week lift cycle. The routine is a slightly modified version of [this](https://jackedgorilla.com/chris-pratt-workout-routine/). Non-lift days should be supplemented with active recovery workouts. ### Schedule ::: {.cell execution_count=2} ``` {.python .cell-code} schedule.to_html(index=False, render_links=True) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=2}
Week Sunday Monday Tuesday Wednesday Thursday Friday Saturday
1 Cardio Chest & Triceps, Run Back & Biceps Shoulders & Traps, Run Legs Chest & Triceps, Run Cardio
2 Cardio Shoulders & Traps, Run Chest & Triceps Back & Biceps, Run Legs Shoulders & Traps, Run Cardio
3 Cardio Back & Biceps, Run Shoulders & Traps Chest & Triceps, Run Legs Back & Biceps, Run Cardio
4 Cardio Chest & Triceps, Run Legs Shoulders & Traps, Run Legs Back & Biceps, Run Cardio
::: ::: ### Back & Biceps ::: {.cell execution_count=3} ``` {.python .cell-code} w1.to_html(index=False) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=3}
Lift Sets Reps
Deadlift 4 10, 8, 5, 3
Pull-Ups 4 10
Lat Pull Downs 4 10
Rows 4 12
Face Pulls 4 12
Dumbbell Rows 4 12
Hammer Curls 3 12
Barbell Curls 3 12
Back Hyperextension 4 12
Planks 3 60 seconds
Leg Raises 3 15
Sit Ups 3 25
::: ::: ### Chest & Triceps ::: {.cell execution_count=4} ``` {.python .cell-code} w2.to_html(index=False) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=4}
Lift Sets Reps
Bench Press 4 10, 8, 5, 3
Incline Press 4 12
Flys 4 12
Dips 3 Failure
Tricep Pushdowns 4 12
Dumbbell Press 4 12
Ab Roller 3 10
Sitting Twists 3 30
Wipers 3 12
::: ::: ### Legs ::: {.cell execution_count=5} ``` {.python .cell-code} w3.to_html(index=False) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=5}
Lift Sets Reps
Back Squat 4 10, 8, 5, 3
Front Squat 4 6
Lunges 3 12
Kettelbell Deadlift 3 12
Leg Kickbacks 3 12
Back Hyperextension 4 12
Calf Raises 4 12
Glute Bridges 3 10
::: ::: ### Shoulders & Traps ::: {.cell execution_count=6} ``` {.python .cell-code} w4.to_html(index=False) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=6}
Lift Sets Reps
Military Press 4 12, 8, 5, 3
Lateral Raises 4 12
Rear Delt Flys 4 12
Front Raises 3 10
Barbell Shrugs 4 10
One Arm Dumbbell Snatch 3 10
Upright Rows 3 10
Kettlebell Swing 3 10
Farmers Carry 3 Failure
Scissor Kicks 3 30 seconds
L-sit 3 Failure
Toe Taps 3 20
::: ::: ## Introductory Routines ::: {.cell execution_count=7} ``` {.python .cell-code} w5 = pd.read_excel(workouts, sheet_name=5) w6 = pd.read_excel(workouts, sheet_name=6) w7 = pd.read_excel(workouts, sheet_name=7) ``` ::: ### Push Intro ::: {.cell execution_count=8} ``` {.python .cell-code} w5.to_html(index=False, render_links=True) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=8}
Lift Sets Reps How-To
Dumbbell Bench Press 3 10 [View](https://weighttraining.guide/exercises/dumbbell-bench-press/)
Dumbell Incline Press 3 10 [View](https://weighttraining.guide/exercises/incline-dumbbell-bench-press/)
Dumbbell Flys 3 10 [View](https://weighttraining.guide/exercises/dumbbell-fly/)
Lateral Raises 3 10 [View](https://weighttraining.guide/exercises/cable-one-arm-lateral-raise/)
Front Raises 3 10 [View](https://weighttraining.guide/exercises/seated-dumbbell-front-raise/)
Tricep Push Down 3 10 [View](https://weighttraining.guide/exercises/triceps-push-down/)
Planks 3 Failure [View](https://weighttraining.guide/exercises/front-plank/)
Sit-ups 3 12 [View](https://weighttraining.guide/exercises/sit-up/)
Leg Raises 3 10 [View](https://weighttraining.guide/exercises/seated-knee-raise/)
::: ::: ### Pull Intro ::: {.cell execution_count=9} ``` {.python .cell-code} w6.to_html(index=False, render_links=True) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=9}
Lift Sets Reps How-To
Cable Rows 3 10 [View](https://weighttraining.guide/exercises/straight-back-seated-cable-row/)

::: ::: ### Legs Intro ::: {.cell execution_count=10} ``` {.python .cell-code} w6.to_html(index=False, render_links=True) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=10}
